description: I'm a committed teamplayer with a multifaceted asset of skills covering most aspects of application developement. Graduated engineer from IMT Mines Albi, my speciality is front-end development. Yet, I've also worked a lot on back-end development, UI prototyping, Agile project manangement, writing documentations and specification, and more. Ambitious and enthusiastic, I'm passionante about in crafting intuitive, appealing, and inclusive apps for greater user satisfaction.

Determination and curiosity are some of my strengths. I often have fun finding new processes or new technologies to improve my work routine, and share with others. As a Techlead, it's crucial to stay up to date, but I take great care to ensure the growth of my colleagues too, always with patience and kindness. My solid knowledge of clean code practices and project management has always been keys to the success of the projects I've worked on.

assets.title: Web Development
assets.description: My knowledge of multiple languages and sound coding practices gives me a lot of autonomy to start new projects, or adapt to existing applications.

assets.title: Agile Management
assets.description: Good management is an important aspect of a project. Having already been a Scrum Master for a team, I'm keen to teach and implement Agile practices in my work teams.

assets.title: UX/UI Design
assets.description: Users are the central element of any product. I use my knowledge to gather their needs and prototype applications that are as versatile, useful and enjoyable as possible.

assets.title: Communication
assets.description: Sharing information is a key component of teamwork. I take care of my communication by choosing the right format and the right words at the right time. I also benefit from my knowledge of multiple languages.

education.title: Baccalaureate S
description: Degree in Engineering Sciences with Mathematics speciality, obtained with honours.

education.title: Intensive study of Mathematics and Phisics
description: Intensive study of mathematics, physics, English and algorithmics (among others), to prepare for the entrance exams to the Grandes Ecoles.

education.title: Engineering school
description: Generalist study of scientific and managerial themes related to engineering professions.

experiences.title: Developement & maintenance of a budget support application
experiences.subtitle: Full Stack Developer / UX Designer / Scrum Master
description: I joined the Transversal Services & Coordination Division, with secure deliveries of strategic and transversal programs across Amadeus.

My team aims to bring Predictability to Management for Operational Efficiency and Simplicity for more than 1700 Actors. With 2 Business Specialist and 2 other web developers, one of our activities is to develop and maintain Management Suite, an application allowing our users to manage their budget and resources.

experiences.title: Creation of innovative applications for humanitarian purposes
experiences.subtitle: Web / Android / AWS Developer
description: As a frontend & backend developer, I have worked on several projects that aim to bring open-source solutions to humanitarian organizations deployed in conflict zones.
I have studied the complete project lifecycle, and the basic deployment processes of a server with Linux.

experiences.title: Prototyping of a Master Data Management System to assist in project management
experiences.subtitle: Full Stack Developer
description: I initiated the implementation of a Master Data Management system, in order to improve the punctuality of the software department's projects.
I worked on the various facets of a three-tier web application: front-end with Angular, back-end with PHP, database with MySQL.
I was also project manager. I used an Agile development process, punctuated by meetings with collaborators from the Cannes and Toulouse sites.

experiences.title: Global Game Jam 2018
experiences.subtitle: Unity Developer
description: The Global Game Jam is a challenge to create a complete video game in only 48 hours.
I participated as a game designer and developer.
